name: The Cursed Oasis
description:
Lost in the blistering sands of the desert you stumble upon a strange Oasis. A mysterious and strange place. A cursed place. Once you enter, you cannot leave. Race against the sunrise, follow the clues and try to solve the curse of the oasis before it's too late!

Unwind and relax as you explore colourful and atmospheric environments.

Features

  • A relaxing, peaceful, exploration-adventure full of enchanting detail
  • Search for hidden items and special items, spread across all five levels
  • Steam Achievements to unlock!
  • Featuring an original score by Emmy-nominated composer Nicholas Singer

  • Incudes BONUS GAME: Oasis at the Edge of the World
  • Incudes BONUS GAME: Oasis of the Frozen North
